Reviews.Title: Razr xt912
Reviews.Author: Ali "Carbon"
Reviews.Content: Disclaimer: I got my xt912 from ebay (barely used).The battery is just fine. Lasts all day with no problems and charges from 0-100% in two hours. Not sure what all the fuss is about I am glad I saved about 200 by avoiding max.Camera is not an SLR but works fine and can take good picture.The phone is super fast and bug free based on my experience. Also it is easily rooted which opens up a lot of new features (titanium backup, rom manager, free tether, etc.)The screen looks amazing and I love the fact that it's 4.3' only (only?). It looks simply amazing without a case. Also, you can put it in a nice case and it will still fit in your pocket (I prefer the protection of otterbox since not trying to impress anyone). I can't stand samsung phones which are all too huge and don't fit anywhere, and look akward and are hard to hold.HDMI outlet is a nice plus.Con:The battery does not come off but haven't had the need to pull it out.Overall thumps up!

Reviews.Title: Definitely Recommend this phone over iphone
Reviews.Author: kanetria
Reviews.Content: I love this phone! No problems with it at all. Fast browsing, downloads apps quickly and great for watching videos. Battery is good too. Automatically updates everything. Glad I didn't get the iphone!

Reviews.Title: Motorola Droid Razr "Great"!
Reviews.Author: ALEX ELIAS
Reviews.Content: So far a great phone! I am going to Europe this summer so I needed a GSM capable phone. Sold my Iphone 4s and purchased this Droid. My only complaint is this odd virtually unnoticeable sound when listening to music and talking on the phone. I purchased it used, didn't expect it to be perfect. definitely surpassed my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Motorola RAZRXT912
Reviews.Author: Miriam Matos
Reviews.Content: It is is very good condition, and works very well.  My son is enjoying it.  It was a gift for him. It was worth the waiting.

Reviews.Title: Dont know what to say abt the Seller
Reviews.Author: SREEHARSHA
Reviews.Content: Not Brand new Lot of scratches on back side and Camera have scratches mostly its refurbished I think.but seller saying its brand new

Reviews.Title: phone was not the original
Reviews.Author: mambo
Reviews.Content: the phone did not feel look or work like the originalbeware of this seller since the phone did not matchthe descriptioncounterfeit phone!!

Reviews.Title: Works Great!!1
Reviews.Author: Brandi "Brandi"
Reviews.Content: I love this phone! The only problem I have is that I have ordered 6 4G LTE sim cards, and none of them are the right ones!  But, the phone is on point.

Reviews.Title: So glad to have this phone.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love the 4G internet.  I like all of the applications and adaptability.  I love the talk to text feature it is awesome with a few corrections.  It is easy to text on and takes great pictures.

Reviews.Title: so, so
Reviews.Author: CW
Reviews.Content: Screen is acting up. Flashing on eighty percent of the screen. These phones are great if you can find one without issues.

Reviews.Title: 9.5 of 10
Reviews.Author: Gerardo
Reviews.Content: this cellphone is really fast and is in much better condicion than i was imagine, its a very slim cell phone and the screen is not too big but it do not have a small screen, i love this cell phone, i recomend it for you

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: roshanda
Reviews.Content: This phone works great. Is in good condition. My son loves it. No damage as we could see. Came right on timr

Reviews.Title: I had 3 of these phone and everyone had tons of problem
Reviews.Author: Dan Li "dan li"
Reviews.Content: This phone works alright at first but start have problem after you use it more. After my 3rd phone, I gave up. I won't buy another Motorola in my life!

Reviews.Title: Great replacement
Reviews.Author: Michelle Lynn Randall
Reviews.Content: So my teen daughter got an older (4) iPhone for her birthday, and she did reasonably well with it until it ended up in the toilet of the bathroom at the library. She was upset. Needless to say, after trying to dry it out it would not work. She had to go a couple of months without a phone before we allowed her to get a replacement.When we were looking at replacements, I knew we were going to get her a little older, probably used  phone. She decided since she is on an iPad all day at school, she didn't want another iPhone. Her dad has the newest version of the RAZR and she likes it, so we found this one at a really good price.Got it really quickly, fired it right up and got it activated without a problem. She is still learning some of the functions on it, but she says that is part of the fun of having a new phone, but loves it. It texts great, calls great and takes great pictures. She hasn't downloaded too many apps yet, but what she has have worked great.Overall we are really happy with this phone for her. It was a good price, a little older and yet it does everything I need it to do to keep her in contact with us. I am glad we got it. Easy to use too.

Reviews.Title: Battery Life Sucks
Reviews.Author: M. Clare
Reviews.Content: The battery in this device is pathetic.  It has a hard time keeping the internet going, too!  I'm guessing the battery was on its last leg when this provider refurbished the Razr.  I am sorry I bought this phone.

Reviews.Title: I turn on my computer I get an error
Reviews.Author: Hecarela23
Reviews.Content: I turn on my computer I get error says invalid SIM card and occasionally says insert SIM card once you have it inside.

Reviews.Title: Working on it.
Reviews.Author: STAMPEDE
Reviews.Content: My phone died after only 2.5 months. Wont charge most of the time and wont hold a charge. Maybe the input jack? Anyway, the seller has offered me a replacement and that will work for me. Stay tuned... Hoping for the best.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: Bea P.
Reviews.Content: I already owned one, love it.  Son was looking for looking for a better phone.  He played with my phone for about 10 minutes and replied " I have got to have one"  .  Love the long usage between battery charges.  Great phone, speedy shipping.

Reviews.Title: Misleading description
Reviews.Author: dela oniovos
Reviews.Content: The item description was misleading. The description stated the product is HD but unfortunately it is the first razr. .I am very unhappy.

Reviews.Title: good phone, wrong color.
Reviews.Author: Olivia Walther
Reviews.Content: Good phone; a little beat up though. And it was not black, it was purple. Thanks for the false advertising.

Reviews.Title: Replacement for Razr Maxx
Reviews.Author: David Marks
Reviews.Content: I knew that this phone had a small battery than my previous Maxx version (RIP) but I never thought it would have gone down to 20% battery life after 3-4 hours of use. I feel that the phone is pretty much a corded phone. Could be a lemon phone, because I cannot use the wifi on it either (sadly, I only tested that out after the 30 day return policy).

Reviews.Title: Sold as new, I think it's used
Reviews.Author: Michael Sullivan
Reviews.Content: This is my third Motorola RAZR.  I have a habit of dropping them.  From power up this one was off.  The screen doesn't auto rotate like my other RAZRs, an icon showing HDMI cable attachment has been on since arrival, the phone chews through power like no bodies kidding and the phone whilst sitting on my desk will power up and down and up and down and up and down for no reason whatever.In the future I'll just use my Verizon Wireless insurance.  At this point I can't wait until next March to buy and I-Phone.
